Load WRCC RAWS timeseries object from a local directory

Source: R/wrcc_load.R
wrcc_load.Rd

Loads WRCC station metadata and data from the rawsDataDir. If the data is not in this directory, this will download and save the data.

wrcc_load(
  wrccID = NULL,
  meta = NULL,
  year = NULL,
  forceDownload = FALSE,
  baseUrl = "https://wrcc.dri.edu/cgi-bin/wea_list2.pl",
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

wrccID

RAWS station identifier (will be upcased)
meta

Tibble of FW13 station metadata.
year

Year to access station data for.
forceDownload

Logical flag stating whether or not to download and override existing data.
baseUrl

Base URL for data queries.
verbose

Logical flag controlling detailed progress statements.

Value

Timeseries object with 'meta' and 'data'.

References

Program for Climate, Ecosystem and Fire Applications

See also

wrcc_createTimeseriesObject

setRawsDataDir

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(RAWSmet)

setRawsDataDir("~/Data/RAWS/")

stationMeta <- wrcc_loadMeta(stateCode = "WA")
rawsObject <- wrcc_load(wrccID = "waWENU", meta = stationMeta, year = 2020)

dplyr::glimpse(rawsObject)
}
